title.rendered: The Vine Rant: Calgary Real Estate Market in 2021 – Things Are Looking Up

content.rendered:
VINE Group’s Kim Nguyen and Hugo Dos Reis are joined by Alberta realtor, Ella Kuindersma, to chat about the Calgary real estate market trends and what we might expect for 2021.

 

Contact information:

Kim Nguyen, Mortgage Associate – VINE Group: kim@vinegroup.ca

Ella Kuindersma, Realtor – RE/MAX Central: ellakrealestate@gmail.com

Hugo Dos Reis, Mortgage Broker – VINE Group: hugo@vinegroup.ca

excerpt.rendered: VINE Group’s Kim Nguyen and Hugo Dos Reis are joined by Alberta realtor, Ella Kuindersma, to chat about the Calgary real estate market trends and what we might expect for 2021.
